blogPost.excerpt: Budgetwell is a personal budgeting tool that is designed to take into account all income, present and future, to help you manage your finances.

localize.description: Budgetwell是一款个人预算工具，它的设计是考虑到所有的收入，现在和未来，帮助你管理你的财务。
Budgetwell是一款個人預算工具，它的設計是考慮到所有的收入，現在和未來，幫助你管理你的財務。

previous.excerpt: Each roll comes with a physical display, so you can hang your NFTP in your bathroom alongside your IRL rolls. All proceeds will be donated to Direct Relief, to improve the lives of people impacted by poverty or emergency situations around the world.
previous.title: Charmin NFTP - The world's first non-fungible toilet paper

localize.description: 每一卷都有实物展示，所以你可以把你的NFTP和你的IRL卷挂在浴室里。所有收益将捐给直接救济组织，用于改善世界各地受贫困或紧急情况影响的人们的生活。

localize.description: 每一卷都有實物展示，所以你可以把你的NFTP和你的IRL卷掛在浴室裏。所有收益將捐給直接救濟組織，用於改善世界各地受貧困或緊急情況影響的人們的生活。
